sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('external', 0)) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie'],
	truncate:true) ~> sink1
